string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I want you to meet with someone. He will have a job for you. Do it and don't ask any questions. Got it?
Good luck stalker.
Retrieve Lock Box for Sultan
Sultan needs the contents of a lock box returned to him.

I need you to retrieve a case for me. It's hidden in a stash. Whatever else is in that stash is yours, but the case is mine. Deal? I will give you the rest of your reward when you have brought it back to me.
Excellent! You have done well.
Sultan's Enemy
Sultan wants revenge on a stalker who cheated him.
A rat stalker has double-crossed me. No one messes with me and lives to see the next sunrise. Kill the asshole. I will make it worth your while.
Good. I should have told you to leave his head on a pike. No matter, everyone knows not to mess with Sultan. Here is your reward.
Kill the Rat
A fellow bandit has betrayed us. Sultan wants him eliminated.

There is a traitor in our midst. One of our own has betrayed us, but he doesn't yet know that I know. He'll be easy to get; just walk up to him, point your pistol at his face and pull the trigger. Just watch out for how his buddies react, you'll probably have to kill them too. Talk to me again when he sleeps with the worms.
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Search Lab X-16
Sultan has a buyer for some documents located inside Lab X-16 in Yantar.

I have a customer who is willing to pay well for some documents located inside that creepy lab over in Yantar. None of these pussies want to go in there because they think it is haunted. If you can get me those documents I'll give you half of what he is paying me. What do you say? Or are you afraid of ghosts too?
Well done. Here is your cut.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Sorry, you must have the wrong guy. If you want to buy something, go ahead, but otherwise you can go bother someone else.
Good luck stalker.
%s Smuggler
Olivius needs %s smuggled past the military.

You know my contact in the Military? The one who used to look the other way when I brought weapons through the checkpoint? Can you believe that son of a bitch wants to start charging me a percentage? Fuck him. I want you to get my next shipment and sneak it past him.
Go pick up %s. Get them past that little shit and I'll make it worth your while.
Yes, you have done well. Here's your cut.
Kill the Double-Crosser
Olivius was double-crossed by a member of the Military and needs him to be taken care of.

You know our friend in the Military? The one who used to let us run weapons past the checkpoint if we slipped him a carton of cigarettes? That little shit now says he wants me to start paying a percentage every time or else he's going to turn us in. Who the hell does he think he's dealing with? I want him dead, you hear me? Dead! Bring me his head!
Good. Fuck that guy.
Fealty to Sultan
If you want to be respected as a bandit, you need to pay your dues to Sultan. He demands 5,000 RU as tribute.

You want to live the romantic life of the rogue, is that it? Look, son. Any fucking wankstain with a peashooter can go around like a common thug if he likes. He can wind up dead in a ditch too, for all I care. You want to be a man? You want to live the good life? Bring 5,000 RU as tribute, swear fealty to me as your Sultan and I'll let you tag along with my merry men.
Good. The rest of the boys around here might respect you now. Go say hello to the glorious bastards, and don't look so nervous about it.
Mob Hit
Sultan has sent me to eliminate some bum, then return for my payment.

See this list? This is a list of rats I need exterminated.
 
...Cheapskates who chose to cut and run rather than pay their debts.
 
...Misers who answered with bullets when my boys begged them for bread.
 
...Bitches and traitors that left Dark Valley to kowtow to Rostok or Sidorovich.
 
They can all go fuck themselves. Here; a name off my list. I'd like you to let me know when I can cross it out.
Ah, cold satisfaction. I like it when shit goes down smoothly. Here, a token of my gratitude.
Eliminate the Military Presence
Sultan wants me to eliminate a nearby Military patrol before they do something stupid.

Those Military fucks are creeping around here again. Most likely to harass our tenants, or take another crack at the nearby lab...\n \n...morons. Those bitches are already dead men walking, but I'll pay you remove them before their idiocy hurts anyone I know.
You've impressed me, stalker. Wish more of the boys around here had your spunk.
Stalker Elimination
Sultan has sent me to enact vengeance on some stalkers that harassed one of his boys.

Alright, listen up. A group of stalkers tried to gang up on one of my boys not too long ago. Luckily he escaped, and is busy recovering in the medical hangar, but we can't let that kind of disrespect go.\n \nYou might need to round up your own posse before you take them on, but these guys tried to massacre my boy. Show them what happens to chucklefucks who try that.
Done? ...Good.
Collect %s
Sultan asked me to collect %s
It's time to remind those retards who the bandits really are. I've got a good mind as to how we'll do this; just tear off their patches and bring them to me, and I'll handle the rest.
It's time to remind those retards who the bandits really are. I've got a good mind as to how we'll do this; just tear off their patches and bring them to me, and I'll handle the rest.
Got them? Great work! Here's your payout.
Eviction Notice
Sultan wants me to drive off the squatters on his farm.

Here's a job for you; some squatters have moved into my farm down south. They refuse to pay rent, and are even scaring prospective tenants away. This simply won't do. Go take some guys and politely escort them out, won't you?
So they tried to pay you with bullets, huh? Typical free loaders. As for you, here's your props.
Night Terror
Sultan wants me to get rid of a dangerous monster.
Another nightmare has managed to worm its way out of the local lab. Tore up of the younger boys real good. I'll give you its last known location. Go find it and kick its ass.
Maybe that'll teach those dumb mutants not to mess with us. Anyway, here's your reward.
Eliminate Mutant Threat in Dark Valley
Olivius has sent me to do some housecleaning. I should return to him for payment once I've cleared the mutants off the marked area.

Yeah, stalkers aren't moving in as often anymore. Why? Because they see the mutants, shit themselves, then leave. If this keeps happening, we won't be able to collect rent, borrow goods... you get the picture? It's time to give the Valley a spring clean.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Turf War
I've agreed to stick up a stalker camp for Olivius. He mentioned that I might need to bring friends.

This one is a real cinch. Sultan's got a mind to shake down a nearby stalker camp; shake things up, remind them who's in charge around here. You'll need to get your own little gang together for this, but there's big props in it for you if you can pull it off.
Ha! Well done! I hope you stripped off all the loot you could; here's a little extra from me.
Chiki-Briki i v Damke
I've been hired to guide a bandit gang around as they "borrow" from local stalkers.
There are a few guys who've been needing someone to take them shopping, if you catch my drift. Scout out some prime targets for them, and you'll get a nice cut when the job is done.
Nice take, eh? Here is your cut.
Hit Man
Olivius has contracted me to run a hit on some poor sucker, then return for payment.
I've got a list of people who've rubbed me the wrong way. I want you to rub one of them out. What do you say?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install basic equipment upgrades, I should bring them back to him if I find any.
I'm in desperate need of new tools, man. I can't do anything with the rusty shit I have and I'm running out of gun oil. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Perfect! This is just what I need, man. I can properly upgrade gear now!
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install advanced equipment upgrades, I should bring them back to him if I find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money.
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install expert equipment upgrades, I should bring them back to him if I find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money.
Lead the way and we will follow. You will get your cut when we are done. Just make sure we are the ones doing the looting and watch our backs.
We should get moving - my trigger finger is getting itchy. Just remember, we get the loot!
You did your job well. Here, consider this a bonus.
Sure.
Find %s for the Bandit medic in Dark Valley
%s is required by the bandits medic to work on medical supplies. I should bring them back to him if I find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Great job! I owe you big time.
